artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: From fashion periodical (P.15,212.1); a young boy on the left with white breeches, a black coat and black hat; on the right a young girl holding a fan in a white dress with yellow sleeves and a purple sash around her waist
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate II from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Vingt-quatrième Cahier, 10 Juillet 1787
